FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Everything you need to run BestMaker AI as your all-in-one generation studio.

items.question: What makes BestMaker AI an all-in-one creator studio?
items.answer: BestMaker AI routes image, video, audio, and copy tasks through one prompt graph. Shared context preserves style, camera cues, and tone so every output stays aligned.

items.question: Can I mix multiple models or engines per project?
items.answer: Yes. Blend BestMaker-native engines with partner models, then assign them to specific layers or shots without losing continuity.

items.question: How fast are generations and edits?
items.answer: Most outputs finish in 10–30 seconds. Parallel pipelines let you preview storyboards, clips, and scripts simultaneously while variants continue to render in the background.

items.question: Which formats can I import or export?
items.answer: Upload JPG, PNG, WEBP, or layered references. Export PNG, JPG, MP4, GIF, WebM, MP3, WAV, and prompt JSON bundles ready for developer or marketing handoff.

items.question: Is commercial usage included?
items.answer: Every asset generated with BestMaker AI includes full commercial rights, making it safe for brand launches, ads, and internal documentation.

items.question: How are my assets secured?
items.answer: Uploads are encrypted at rest, processing happens in isolated workers, and you can choose regional storage plus fine-grained workspace permissions.
